headline: A federal judge has ordered the Trump administration to fully fund food-assistance benefits for November by Friday, criticizing the government’s efforts so far to make payments during the shutdown
Tesla shareholders approve Elon Musk’s historic $1 trillion pay package — here’s when he could pocket the windfall
Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi says she won’t run for re-election and plans to leave her seat in Congress at the end of this term, drawing to a close a decadeslong political career
Employers said they cut more than a million jobs so far this year, a sharp rise in job losses compared with the same period last year, according to a new report
Your flight was canceled amid FAA's cuts to air traffic. Here's what you can do about it
As U.S. competition with China intensifies, the Pentagon is building up Guam as a hub for its security strategy in the Pacific. A campaign to change the island’s status is seizing the moment.

Heritage Foundation president Kevin Roberts defended Tucker Carlson and his controversial interview with white supremacist Nick Fuentes. The fall-out has shaken the conservative think tank to its core.
